findings.title: Owner can change the tax, marketing and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax, marketing, and liquidity fees which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change buyback time
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyback time, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum and minimum amount of buyback window.
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the maximum and minimum amount of the buyback window, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change current buyback window.
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the current buyback window, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change buy back trigger window value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyback trigger window value.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum tokens before swap.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum tokens required before a swap operation, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount.
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which may lead to unintended consequences or security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change percentOfSwapIsLP value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the percentOfSwapIsLP value.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing address.

findings.title: Owner can change priceImpactTriggerBuybackThreshold value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the priceImpactTriggerBuybackThreshold value, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Modifiable Buyback Impact Multiplier
findings.description: The owner has the ability to change the maximum, minimum, and current buyback impact multiplier, which can potentially lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum BNB buyback amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum BNB buyback amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner Can Change Presale Presets
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change presale presets before or after the sale.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from fee and max transaction restrictions
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from fee and maximum transaction amount restrictions.

findings.title: Owner Privilege Retake
findings.description: The owner can lock and unlock, allowing them to retake privileges even after ownership renunciation.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit.
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.
